notification.communityContentToBeAnonymized: Wo nyinaa content wɔ community yi mu bɛyɛ anonymized na ɛbɛfa archive wɔ 7 dae mu, akyi no wo renn able sɛ wo delete no anaa wo sesa no. Hwɛ wo content no ase.

email.possibleFraudFooter: Klike wɔ community link no ase, log in sɛ admin na yɛ Fraud management fii menu no mu.
email.possibleFraudSubHeader: Nɔmba a ɛyɛ possible fraudulent activities ne estimated 75% chance of fraud
email.possibleFraudInformation: Yɛn automated system no ahyɛ ase sɛ ɛhɔ ara possible fraudulent activity. Wo bisa so akyerɛkyerɛ yiye wɔ Community admin interface mu. Sɛnea activity yi biara nni fraud mu nsɛm nti yɛ pɛ sɛ wo hwɛ yiye sɛ wo delete content no.
email.possibleFraudHeader: Ebia a ɛyɛ sɛ wɔbɔɔ fo
email.automaticToxicityDetection: AI algorithms no a otomatikli flagged content yi sɛ ɛyɛ toxic na ɛbɔ estimate toxicity no. Sɛ ɛhia sɛ wo delete content no a, wo bisa.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionVision: AI algorithm no otomatikli flagged visual imagery a ɛwɔ content yi ho. Algorithm no hwɛ imagery a ɛka ho adult, violent, medical, ne racy imagery. Sɛ ɛhia sɛ wo delete content no a, wo bisa.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionDisclaimer: Bɛyɛ bi a, AI algorithm no rekɔkɔɔ soɔ yiye a, ɛnka hwee, wo nni haw sɛ wo yɛ biribiara na wo bisa adi kan
